data.comment: The match is underway. Atletico Mineiro have kicked-off.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 2, Ramon Abatti Abel awards the away team a throw-in.
Bragantino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Bragantino to take a throw-in in Atletico Mineiro territory.
In the minute 4, Can Atletico Mineiro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bragantino's half?
Atletico Mineiro's Mailton has run offside.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
In the minute 7, Bragantino have a goal kick.
Free kick Atletico Mineiro.
Ball goes out of play for a Bragantino goal kick.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro at Independencia.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro.
Edimar (Bragantino) gets booked by Ramon Abatti Abel, and will miss the next match due to the number of yellow cards received this season.
In the minute 14, Play has been interrupted briefly in Belo Horizonte to check on Eduardo Sasha, who is grimacing with pain.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a Atletico Mineiro throw-in in Bragantino's half.
Ramon Abatti Abel awards Bragantino a goal kick.
In the minute 18, Atletico Mineiro's Eduardo Sasha looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Ramon Abatti Abel.
In the minute 19, Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
Ball safe as Bragantino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Bragantino.
In the minute 21, Corner awarded to Bragantino.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Belo Horizonte.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Bragantino.
In the minute 23, Important block from the Bragantino defence as Alan Franco fires in a strike for Atletico Mineiro.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Claudinho of Bragantino smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 25, Mailton of Atletico Mineiro gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Bragantino at Independencia.
Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
In the minute 27, Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Belo Horizonte.
Atletico Mineiro's Eduardo Sasha gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Bragantino defender.
In the minute 28, Atletico Mineiro are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Ramon Abatti Abel.
In the minute 29, Atletico Mineiro's Rever scores with his head to give his side a 1-0 lead.
That's a fine assist from Guilherme Arana.
In Belo Horizonte a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 31, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Bragantino.
In Belo Horizonte, Alan Franco of Atletico Mineiro is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 33, Ramon Abatti Abel signals a Atletico Mineiro throw-in in Bragantino's half.
Ball safe as Bragantino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 33, Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Bragantino.
Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 36, Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Bragantino in their own half.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro at Independencia.
Throw-in for Bragantino in their own half.
In the minute 37, Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
Throw-in for Bragantino close to the penalty box.
Ramon Abatti Abel awards Atletico Mineiro a goal kick.
In the minute 38, Can Bragantino get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half?
Aderlan (Bragantino) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Bragantino's Claudinho is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 39, Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Ramon Abatti Abel.
Bragantino are coming forward and Edimar gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Atletico Mineiro at Independencia.
In the minute 40, Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
Atletico Mineiro have a goal kick.
In Belo Horizonte Atletico Mineiro drive forward through Mailton. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 41, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Belo Horizonte a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Atletico Mineiro drives forward and Eduardo Sasha gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
Atletico Mineiro to take a throw-in in Bragantino territory.
At Independencia the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Ramon Abatti Abel.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, Bragantino have kicked-off the second half at Independencia.
Throw-in high up the field for Bragantino in Belo Horizonte.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
In the minute 49, Goal! The away team draw level at 1-1 through Alerrandro.
Ramon Abatti Abel awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Bragantino goal kick.
In the minute 51, Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Bragantino in their own half.
Bragantino's Artur breaks free at Independencia. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 54, Ball goes out of play for a Atletico Mineiro goal kick.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Bragantino.
Bragantino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 57, Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
Bragantino have a goal kick.
Free kick Bragantino.
Keno is on a sub for Mailton for Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 58, Claudinho is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Bragantinoâ€™s Claudinho is on his feet again at Independencia.
In the minute 59, Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
Guilherme Arana (Atletico Mineiro) has received a first yellow card.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 61, Atletico Mineiro to take a throw-in in Bragantino territory.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Ramon Abatti Abel.
Penalty! Ramon Abatti Abel points to the spot, great chance for Atletico Mineiro...
In the minute 64, Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
Atletico Mineiro are on the attack at Independencia, where Jefferson Savarino is presented with a great scoring opportunity. But the ball hits the upright!
Rever gets his shot on target but fails to score for Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 66, Atletico Mineiro's Eduardo Sasha is whistled for offside at Independencia.
Jefferson Savarino for Atletico Mineiro drives towards goal at Independencia. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Free kick Bragantino.
In the minute 69, Bragantino pushes forward through Lucas Evangelista, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Atletico Mineiro drive forward but Keno is judged offside.
In the minute 70, Robinho is replacing Alerrandro for the away team.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro at Independencia.
Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
In the minute 73, In Belo Horizonte Bragantino attack through Ricardo Ryller. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Belo Horizonte.
In Belo Horizonte a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
In the minute 74, Jorge Sampaoli (Atletico Mineiro) is making a second substitution, with Nathan replacing Alan Franco.
Throw-in Bragantino.
In the minute 75, Bragantino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ramon Abatti Abel awards the home team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 77, Ball safe as Bragantino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bragantino's Artur gets in a shot on goal at Independencia. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 80, Atletico Mineiro are pushing forward but Guilherme Arana's finish is wide of the goal.
Ramon Abatti Abel awards Bragantino a goal kick.
In the minute 81, Jefferson Savarino for Atletico Mineiro is whistled offside.
The away team replace Aderlan with Barreto.
Edimar for Bragantino gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Atletico Mineiro at Independencia.
In the minute 83, It's a goal kick for the away team in Belo Horizonte.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a Bragantino throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half.
Ramon Abatti Abel signals a free kick to Bragantino.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Bragantino.
Jefferson Savarino scores to make it 2-1 at Independencia.
Keno instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 89, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Artur.
Artur returns to the field for Bragantino after picking up a slight injury.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Bragantino.
Can Bragantino get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half?
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Bragantino.
Can Atletico Mineiro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bragantino's half?
The match is over. Final score 2-1.
Jorge Sampaoli is making the team's third substitution at Independencia with Hyoran replacing Eduardo Sasha.
The away team has substituted Artur with Jan Hurtado. Mauricio Barbieri is thus making his third change.
